string.value: After handing Teo the items, he sent it to the jeweler, who made it for him fairly quickly. A beautiful necklace with Alligator and Dragon skin. I better show this to Maya now.
With the necklace, Lionel sure doesn't look like a monster now. Phew!
Please take this necklace to Maya.
Please tell her to take care of herself as well as the pet.
Really? Please let me know when you have time. I'll be here waiting.
Welcome back. That's a lot of traveling you did going back and forth from here to Lith Harbor. I got some green tea here from Ellinia, so have a seat while I make one for you.

Ahh, this is the necklace. 
Oh my goodness, it's beautiful! Let's put this on Lionel right now. 
 (Lionel doesn't seem to mind the necklace, and sticks by Maya) 
Lionel, it looks good on you!
Thank you so much. With this, I can finally go outside with Lionel. I'll write up a thank-you letter to Teo. \nOf course, I haven't forgotten about you. This isn't much, but please take it.
